1. Support CTAS in carbon and support creating aggregation tables using CTAS.And update aggregation table information to main table schema.
2. Support creating timeseries while creating main table.
3. Create UDF for timestamp to extract year,month,day,hour and minute from timestamp and date
4 Load aggregation tables from main table after finish.
. Add the API in carbon layer to get suitable aggregation table for group by query. Update query plan in carbon optimizer to support aggregation tables for group by queries.
8. Refresh the cache of main table after droping of aggregation table.
10. Handle compaction in aggregation tables.
12. Handle alter table scenarios for aggregation table
